tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE PropertyListings (
 property_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
 property_name VARCHAR(255),
 property_type VARCHAR(50),
 property_location VARCHAR(100),
 property_price DECIMAL,
 property_size INT,
 property_description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE luxury_property_listings (
    property_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    property_name VARCHAR(255),
    property_location VARCHAR(255),
    property_price DECIMAL(10, 2),
    property_description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE customer_preferences (
    customer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_name VARCHAR(255),
    customer_email VARCHAR(255),
    preferred_property_location VARCHAR(255),
    preferred_property_price_range VARCHAR(50),
    preferred_property_type VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE customers (
    customer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    email VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    first_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    last_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    preference VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE property_listings (
    listing_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    property_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    property_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    price DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL,
    location VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    post_date DATE NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE customer_preferences (
    preference_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id INT NOT NULL,
    property_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    location VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    max_price DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE Properties (
    property_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    title VARCHAR(100),
    description TEXT,
    price DECIMAL(10, 2),
    location VARCHAR(100),
    size INT
);

CREATE TABLE Searches (
    search_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id INT,
    min_price DECIMAL(10, 2),
    max_price DECIMAL(10, 2),
    min_size INT,
    max_size INT,
    location VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE luxury_property_listings(
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  property_name VARCHAR(255),
  property_type VARCHAR(50),
  property_price DECIMAL(10, 2),
  location VARCHAR(100),
  listing_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE customers(
  customer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  first_name VARCHAR(50),
  last_name VARCHAR(50),
  email VARCHAR(100),
  phone_number VARCHAR(15),
  preferences JSON
);

CREATE TABLE search_criteria(
  criteria_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  customer_id INT,
  property_type VARCHAR(50),
  location VARCHAR(100),
  price_range VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE notification_queue(
  notification_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  customer_id INT,
  property_id INT,
  sent_date TIMESTAMP,
  status VARCHAR(20)
);
